import type { Assign } from '@ark-ui/vue'
import { SegmentGroup } from '@ark-ui/vue/segment-group'
import { segmentGroup } from 'styled-system/recipes'
import type { HTMLStyledProps } from 'styled-system/types'
import type { Component } from 'vue'
import { createStyleContext } from '~/lib/create-style-context'

const { withProvider, withContext } = createStyleContext(segmentGroup)

export type RootProviderProps = Component<typeof RootProvider>
export const RootProvider = withProvider<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SegmentGroup.RootProviderBaseProps>
>(SegmentGroup.RootProvider, 'root')

export type RootProps = Component<typeof Root>
export const Root = withProvider<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SegmentGroup.RootBaseProps>>(
  SegmentGroup.Root,
  'root',
)

export type IndicatorProps = Component<typeof Indicator>
export const Indicator = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SegmentGroup.IndicatorBaseProps>
>(SegmentGroup.Indicator, 'indicator')

export type ItemControlProps = Component<typeof ItemControl>
export const ItemControl = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SegmentGroup.ItemControlBaseProps>
>(SegmentGroup.ItemControl, 'itemControl')

export type ItemProps = Component<typeof Item>
export const Item = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'label'>, SegmentGroup.ItemBaseProps>>(
  SegmentGroup.Item,
  'item',
)

export type ItemTextProps = Component<typeof ItemText>
export const ItemText = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'span'>, SegmentGroup.ItemTextBaseProps>
>(SegmentGroup.ItemText, 'itemText')

export type LabelProps = Component<typeof Label>
export const Label = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'label'>, SegmentGroup.LabelBaseProps>>(
  SegmentGroup.Label,
  'label',
)

export {
  SegmentGroupContext as Context,
  type SegmentGroupContextProps as ContextProps,
  SegmentGroupItemHiddenInput as ItemHiddenInput,
  type SegmentGroupItemHiddenInputProps as ItemHiddenInputProps,
} from '@ark-ui/vue/segment-group'
